EmailTemplate.description: Channel Partner Remove Team Member Request
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Request: Email to Channel Partner when Remove Member Request is Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: New Remove Team Member Request Rejected for: {!Partner_Request__c.First_Name__c} {!Partner_Request__c.Last_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Your remove a team member request was rejected. Click here to view the details of your request.Please reach out to the Global Channel Partner team if you have any questions. (Global Channel Partner team should be set as mailto: GlobalChannelPartnerOps@illumina.com)
Thank you.
